original_title: Mayantha Dissanayake has submitted letter resigning as COPF Chairman – Speaker
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – The Speaker of Parliament Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena informed the Parliament that he has received MP Mayantha Dissanayake's letter of resignation from the post of Chairman of the Committee on Public Finance (COPF).
He made the announcement when Parliament convened on Tuesday (7).
